title: Mahindra Finance raises Rs 300 crore by issuing bonds - Economic Times
content: Mahindra Finance raises Rs 300 crore by issuing bonds  Economic Times
description: ​​A meeting of the committee of the board on Tuesday approved the allotment of 3,000 secured redeemable non-convertible debentures (NCDs) of a face value of Rs 10 lakh each, aggregating to Rs 300 crore through private placement, Mahindra Finance said in a regulatory filing.
